name: SpaceCowboyDemo
description:
Become a space cowboy and shoot bullets! You find yourself transported into the very depths of space and what's this? All you have is a gun and there seems to be strange figures coming at you? Well, what are you standing around there for cowboy, start shooting! And maybe in the end, you'll get back to that planet of yours in the end.

Github repository:

https://github.com/SwanyeeA/Platformer
